title: "TRADED" M101-6 Mendelsohn Cobb, WTTF T206 Green Cobb
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: "TRADED" M101-6 Mendelsohn Cobb, WTTF T206 Green Cobb
posts.post_content:
TRADED:  RARE 1917-25 M101-6 Felix Mendelsohn Cobb SGC-10

This rare exhibit-size postcard of Cobb has only been graded 3 times by PSA and 4 times by SGC.

Here are a few links about my card:

PSA POP 
[url]https://www.psacard.com/pop/baseball-cards/1917-20/felix-mendelsohn/103136[/url] 

SGC POP
[url]https://gosgc.com/pop-report/result/1917-20%20Felix%20Mendelsohn%20%28M101-6%29/Baseball[/url] 

Sports Collectors Daily article on the M101-6s
[url]https://www.sportscollectorsdaily.com/m101-6-felix-mendelsohn-soars-to-ruthian-heights/[/url]  

REA Auction Description for my exact card back in 2013
[url]https://robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2013/spring/376/1917-1920-m101-felix-mendelsohn-cobb/[/url] 

Recent eBay Listing for my card, prior to me obtaining it
[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/1917-1920-M101-6-Felix-Mendelsohn-Ty-Cobb-SGC-10-1-Rare-sold-for-15k-/143607374511?hash=item216faaa2af%3Ag%3AjQQAAOSw8QRedBtw&nma=true&si=OamAP1B2WC6FyHR2r%252FEM9Yy2lco%253D&orig_cvip=true&nordt=true&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2557[/url]  

Flickr Album page with scans
[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/knouse-albums/albums/72157714456674726[/url]


I would like to trade for a T206 Green Cobb

Steve

Please reply to my email:  [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]
